12233.content:
Dear Blaze,

We've actually been thinking and maybe it would be alright if you could come with us to the water park tomorrow. The water park's been shut down for 6 months after that fire that you caused burned all the kiddie rides. But we thank you for that. We've been hanging around there for 3 months now and we think it would be ok if you join us. We usually have a predetermined schedule for what we wear when we go there, and this time, we wear nothing. So come join us. We'll be waiting for you at the entrance.


Your Friend,
Harlem


That was the invite Blaze recieved yesterday. She was excited to go, and took no time the next day to get there. But when she arrived at the entrance, no one was there. There wasn't a posted time on the invite at all. She then decided to start it up for them. But as she walked by the entrance..........
12233.title: The Invite

12313.content:
Dear Miss Blaze,

I represent the highest popular research facility as the test evaluator. I would like for you to come to the research facility and do a few tests for study in science. I will not tell you what the tests are, due to the high number of people rejecting my offer. You may bring one article of clothing or just your whole body. Either way, your action for the tests will help us in the future. If you accept, head to the tall building 2.5 miles north of your castle. If you reject, return this immediately. Your choice.


Sincerely,
Dr. Agen


That was the letter that Blaze recieved a few days ago. She has been pondering her choice for that length of time as well, thinking that a name like Agen was something else backwards. But she forgot about this theory and went over to the research facility. After navigating through its long halls, with men aweing at her nudeness, she reached the testing room. It was a cube room with white walls. There was nothing inside of there, not even a chair. Blaze closed the door behind her and stood in the boring room for a while. She was starting to reject her decision to come here until.........
12313.title: The Letter

1521.content: As Blaze kept looking through the kitchen, she couldn't find anything to eat. Bolt was busy doing other things and has taken everyone's credit card after Rouge bought all the diamonds from all the museums with hers. So no one could buy anything at all. Not even food. He called this method "Material Starvation". Everyone else called it Death. Especially Blaze. She needed food badly. And she hasn't had any for 3 days. As she finished her search of food for the 50th time, her eyes went small, she blinked, and then she went cannibal. However, she needed to choose who to eat first.
1521.title: Craziness starts here....

1543.content: Blaze was sitting in her TV chair, flipping through all the channels to find something on. She was waiting for Bolt to get home so that way they could do Sex Night. He has been gone for the past 2 hours, Blaze thought, What could he be doing? She then heard the door open and then close. Blaze then got up from her chair, walked to the door room, and saw Bolt as his usual self. He was 14, had an average man's look, but could kill someone with his own fists in a matter of seconds. He had red fur, was a cat like Blaze, and was her husband/brother. He was wearing his usual clothing during spring: A Dark Red T-shirt, Dark Red/Brown Cargo Shorts, Dark Red Military Gloves, and Dark Red Military Boots. Only this time, his right eye was black. "Um," Blaze said, "Why is your right eye black?" "Who said anything about it being black?" Bolt said as he walked by her, "It has always been red." "Yes," Blaze said, "But now it's black. What did you do to it?" "Nothing," Bolt said. "Tell me," Blaze said. "It's nothing," Bolt said, temper increasing.
1543.title: The Fight Club

choices: Slide two fingers on his bare right arm
Ask for him to look at her
15431.content: Blaze started to inflate her breasts and ass with fire [Yes, Fire HourGlass is involved in the first part of story] as she took off all her clothes. "Are you sure?" Blaze said in a sexy tone. "Yes I'm sure," Bolt said. Bolt walked into the kitchen and started cutting up potatoes with a chef's knife. Blaze then knew that there was a risk of pushing Bolt too far, but a greater risk in not learning where the black eye came from.

154311.title: Twitching: Not A Good Sign

154312.content: "Why don't you take a look at me?" Blaze said seductively. Bolt changed his grip on the chef's knife to dagger grip, stabbed the knife onto the cutting board, and turned around to see a very sexy Blaze. The anger in Bolt's mind went away instantly at the sight of her massive and uncovered boobs. "You want some of this?" Blaze said. Bolt nodded his head up and down really fast. "Then tell me where yo were while I was waiting for you," Blaze said seductively. "At a fight club," Bolt said, distracted by Blaze's massive boobs. But the boobs and the ass went back to normal right after Bolt said that. "A fight club?!" Blaze yelled, "Why are you even there?!" "To get usuable money," Bolt said, "Just in case a store only takes cash."
154312.title: Seduction of Answers

Blood is now over the walls. On the floor is a dead Blaze clutching her throat like it was slashed by a sword.


Fatality! Retry?

15432.content: "Come on," Blaze said in the same tone, "Tell me." "I told you no!" Bolt said, rage halfway to full. "Tell me," Blaze said in the same tone. Only 1 second went by before Blaze was hit by a chef's knife in the right shoulder. She was then uppercutted, and stuck into the ground by the chef knife's blade by a raging Bolt. "Look," Bolt said ragingly, "I've fucking had a long fucking night! So would you fucking stop fucking worrying about my fucking black eye and just fucking get the fuck on with your fucking life?!" Bolt stepped his foot off the chef's knife and walked away.

She started to shed a tear, knowing that the old Bolt was gone forever. Bolt took the knife out of her right shoulder with his psychokinetic powers, not even noticing Blaze sheding a tear.

Bolt made no other expression besides rage, and just stood there, looking at the lifeless body of Blaze.

You have died. Head back to previous chapter?
